about_VBA_PassThroughQuery
Microsoft Access Pass Through Queries to SQL Server https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/1482/microsoft-access-pass-through-queries-to-sql-server/

Private Sub cmdCleanTableNames_Click()
Dim dbs As DAO.Database Set dbs = CurrentDb dbs.Execute "PT_CleanStrings"
End Sub
'This is the Local PassThrough UPDATE query UPDATE e4 SET e4.T103_ReportingTableNames_enum_04_Description = REPLACE(REPLACE(e4.T103_ReportingTableNames_enum_04_Description, '[', ''), ']', '') FROM [RiskMngt].[Reporting].[T103_ReportingTableNames_enum_04] e4
